messages.message: Anyone know how to correctly run local regression tests? I get some failures when running the ones on master, says that "account with username (ashish) not found." How would I correctly set the username and access tokens to use? @dlluncor @Ashish
which specific regression tests are you referring to here? specific commands you are running?
I have `make run-regression-test-services` running and then in another tab run `make run-regression-test-local FAST=true` in `api-server`

The command that actually runs the tests (the second one) gets one failure, and then the command that is running the test services reports the following:
```
2018/12/17 09:30:38 ERROR accountservice/handler/oauth.go:414 -- Fail: Token not found.
2018/12/17 09:30:39 ERROR accountservice/handler/oauth.go:414 -- Fail: Token not found.
2018/12/17 09:30:39 ERROR accountservice/handler/account.go:497 -- Fail: Account with username (ashish) not found
2018/12/17 09:30:39 ERROR accountservice/handler/account.go:497 -- Fail: Account with username (ashish) not found
2018/12/17 09:30:40 ERROR accountservice/handler/account.go:497 -- Fail: Account with username (ashish) not found
2018/12/17 09:30:40 ERROR accountservice/handler/account.go:497 -- Fail: Account with username (ashish) not found
```

Also in addition to fixing this issue, I might actually be trying to write my test in the wrong place... I am writing a test for the use of refiner FNs within udfs, is this the write place? Was going to run a flow with a UDF within the apps-server regression tests (I'm basically trying to cut down on some of my UAT tasks)
Yes that's the right place to do things.
I think I know what's going wrong there. Out teardown methods aren't working quite correctly.
Did you mean API sever or apps server?

was thinking of writing my test in apps-server since it tests the udf functionality itself rather than an API. But I was trying to run regression tests in all four of the given locations first, just to make sure everything was passing locally
That's how I came across this issue in `api-server`
can you try to down the regresssion-test-services code
tab*, and then run without the FAST flag
